verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: withdrew] [ARG2: from the United Nations Human Rights Council] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , [ARGM-PRD: making good on a pledge to leave a body it accused of hypocrisy and criticized as biased against] Israel.

< p > [ARG0: The Trump administration] withdrew from the United Nations Human Rights Council on Tuesday , [V: making] [ARG1: good] [ARG2: on a pledge to leave a body it accused of hypocrisy and criticized as biased against] Israel.

< p > The Trump administration withdrew from the United Nations Human Rights Council on Tuesday , making good on a pledge to [V: leave] [ARG1: a body it accused of hypocrisy and criticized as biased against] Israel.

< p > The Trump administration withdrew from the United Nations Human Rights Council on Tuesday , making good on a pledge to leave [ARG1: a body] [ARG0: it] [V: accused] [ARG2: of hypocrisy] and criticized as biased against Israel.

< p > The Trump administration withdrew from the United Nations Human Rights Council on Tuesday , making good on a pledge to leave [ARG1: a body] [ARG0: it] accused of hypocrisy and [V: criticized] [ARG2: as biased against] Israel.

< p > The Trump administration withdrew from the United Nations Human Rights Council on Tuesday , making good on a pledge to leave a body it accused of hypocrisy and criticized as [V: biased] against Israel.
